Using an angle from -90 to 90 degrees to specify directions, say in what directions each of the eigenvectors is pointed. (Your answer should be good to $\pm 10 degrees$. Remember, 0 degrees is horizontal.)

```{r echo=FALSE}
streamlines(dx ~ -2*x + y, dy ~ y - 0.6*x, 
            domain=domain(x=-1:1, y=-1:1), npts=25,
            nsteps=20) %>%
  gf_labs(subtitle="System A")
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
streamlines(dx ~ x + 0.5*y, dy ~  0.5*x, 
            domain=domain(x=-1:1, y=-1:1), npts=25,
            nsteps=20) %>%
  gf_labs(subtitle="System B")
```
```{r echo=FALSE}
streamlines(dx ~ -x + 1.5*y, dy ~  0.5*x, 
            domain=domain(x=-1:1, y=-1:1), npts=25,
            nsteps=20) %>%
  gf_labs(subtitle="System C")
```
